verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Cause me to come to Thy river, O Lord,
Cause me to come to Thy river, O Lord,
Cause me to come to Thy river, O Lord,
Cause me to come, cause me to drink,
Cause me to live.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Cause me to drink at Thy river, O Lord...

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Cause me to live in Thy river, O Lord...
